about_the_game:
The Supporter Pack is a way to show appreciation and fund further development of the game, while showing style in the arena! It includes:

  • A new Gold skin for the base model of the game

  • Gold coating skins for all weapons in-game

  • A Golden Crown to show your status as a supporter and demostrate who is the real King.

  • Each one can be used separately or mixed together.

The DLC includes only cosmetics that do not modify gameplay or give any type of advantage or bonus stats, and they unlock immediately upon purchase.

This bundle is a token of appreciation to all the people that wants to help and make the game even better! Thank you for your support!

content_descriptors.notes: There is no sexual content of any kind in the game. The game has gore effects like blood and limbs flying when the player's body gets in contact with explosives like grenades or bullets. The game contains no depictions of drugs or alcohol.

name: Golden Supporter Pack
short_description: THRILLKINGS is a fast-paced Arena FPS with a set of weapons and movement inspired by games from the early 2000s. Compete in classic and new game modes, dominate your enemies through a variety of maps with unique traversal mechanics, and show support with this Golden pack!
